General.Name: ICD Co. Ltd
General.Description: ICD Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of LCD, semiconductor, and flat panel display equipment in South Korea and internationally. The company offers AMOLED equipment, including HDP etchers, dry etchers, plasma treatment systems, and evaporators; and TFT-LCD equipment comprising dry etchers and plasma ashers. It also provides parts, such as electrostatic chucks, high voltage DC generators, end point detectors, 3D glass forming systems, and surface treatment parts. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Anseong, South Korea.
